channel.title: Map on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Map on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 West - Bridger Valley Route Diagram
item.description: Bridger Valley route diagram on I-80 west. This sign is posted on I-80 on both entrances to the Bridger Valley on I-80, as well as at a truck parking area.

item.title: TC-1 East - Route Diagram
item.description: TC-1 East - Route Diagram showing BC-5 (Coquihalla Highway), BC-3 (Crowsnest Highway) and TC-1 (Trans-Canada Highway). TC-1 leaves the freeway at Hope.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Crossing Map
item.description: Border Crossing map on I-5 north approaching WA-543.

item.title: Hunter Creek Rest Area - Highway Information
item.description: Route map for the adjacent area of British Columbia, and distances to major destinations. Three routes split off into the interior of British Columbia at Hope just east of here: BC-5 to Coquihalla Pass, TC-1 through the Frasier River Canyon, and BC-3 over Allison Pass.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 109 and 103 Route Diagram
item.description: Route Diagram showing OR-99 access to I-5 for Myrtle Creek and Riddle.

item.title: Diagram of US-20/OR-126/OR-22 Junction - US-20/OR-126 West
item.description: Map diagram of junction at US-20/OR-126/OR-22 junction on US-20/OR-126 West. Continue straight for OR-22 west to Salem; merge left to continue west on US-20/OR-126 West to Eugene.

item.title: I-80 West - Bridger Valley Route Diagram
item.description: Bridger Valley route diagram on I-80 west.

item.title: Bridger Valley Route Diagram
item.description: Route diagram for the Bridger Valley on I-80 east, descending into the Bridger Valley.
